channel.title: Some faq's
channel.description:
guide on making a server :P
[CODE]1.download testscape 2.extract testscape 3.open testscape and press run server -leave this page open 4.run moparscape/www.moparisthebest.com 5.press enter 6.log in[/CODE]
guide for class not specified
[CODE]1.start 2.right click my computer 3.properties 4.advanced 5.variables 6.add and add this::
CLASSPATH CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.[/CODE]
guide to port already in use??
[CODE]1.close all moparscape files,web pages 2.open your source 3.press run server 4.load moparscape 5.enter and log in.. dont press start server :P[/CODE]
how to log in a server??
[CODE]1.run moparscape/www,moparisthebest.com 2.go to file 3.new server 4.put in ip, ex:: camscape.no-ip.org 5.ok 6.enter 7.log in :P[/CODE]
how come i cant make myself admin on testscape??
[CODE]1.open client.java 2.search for admin list 3.there will be a list of names 4.replace with yours 5.save,compile[/CODE]
where is client.java???
[CODE]this is a question for the many people that ask it... it is a notepad file in which you use to update your server , it is located in your server source....[/CODE]
where can i change monsters hp??
[CODE]1.open your npc.cfg file and then update hp :P[/CODE]
what is moparscape??
[CODE]it is a runescape private server.. really no point basically just to have fun and make a kick ass server :P[/CODE]
any more questions i have missed plz post!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
nooby questions but i hope will help......

item.title: Some faq's
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

guide on making a server

1.download testscape 2.extract testscape 3.open testscape and press run server -leave this page open 4.run moparscape/www.moparisthebest.com 5.press enter 6.log in

guide for class not specified

[CODE]1.start
2.right click my computer
3.properties
4.advanced
5.variables
6.add and add this::

CLASSPATH
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.[/CODE]

guide to port already in use??

1.close all moparscape files,web pages 2.open your source 3.press run server 4.load moparscape 5.enter and log in.. dont press start server :P

how to log in a server??

1.run moparscape/www,moparisthebest.com 2.go to file 3.new server 4.put in ip, ex:: camscape.no-ip.org 5.ok 6.enter 7.log in :P

how come i cant make myself admin on testscape??

1.open client.java 2.search for admin list 3.there will be a list of names 4.replace with yours 5.save,compile

where is client.java???

this is a question for the many people that ask it... it is a notepad file in which you use to update your server , it is located in your server source....

where can i change monsters hp??

1.open your npc.cfg file and then update hp :P

what is moparscape??

it is a runescape private server.. really no point basically just to have fun and make a kick ass server :P

any more questions i have missed plz post!!!

nooby questions but i hope will helpâ€¦

Read full topic
